name: Solid Music
description: Open Source bot to stream media through Telegram Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls and Pyrogram

API_ID.description: Fill it with your API_ID, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Fill it with your API_HASH, get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Fill it with your Bot token, get it from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Fill it with your telegram id, not username

SESSION.description: Fill it with your assistant pyrogram string session

GROUP_LINK.description: Your support group link, can use private or public group

CHANNEL_LINK.description: your channel support link, can use private or public channel

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: fill it if you fork from original repo

AUTO_LEAVE.description: Don't change the value filled below.
